roles.title: leader in government strategy and national development
quotes: Ahmed Al Mahmood is a prominent leader in government strategy and national development, driving programs that align with the UAE’s vision for a sustainable and innovative future.
Introducing programs that provide education, mentorship, and entrepreneurship opportunities for women and young people in the Middle East.
Helping companies merge into the Middle East market while aligning with Dubai’s strategy for sustainable growth.

The partnership will also deliver tailored programs to help businesses navigate market entry and align their operations with the UAE’s Vision 2025–2030, offering annual reports to measure progress and ensure long-term impact.
#Iraq has them all but struggles with the chaos of the 3rd type.
